tutorial.tutorial1:
Level: Tutorial 1 
hi there ~ {{name}}, welcome to Black & White! This is a tutorial for beginners 
This parkour is not an ordinary parkour, in which the world is divided into two dimensions: black and white. The dimension is determined by the color of the surrounding walls, and the computer can switch dimensions by pressing the E key. The relative positions in the two dimensions are unchanged before and after switching. 
Try switching dimensions now!
tutorial.tutorial2:
Level: Tutorial 2
Now, you already know how to switch dimensions.
Keep in mind, the terrain can be different in the two dimensions! This level is a perfect example.
Now, switch dimensions and figure out how to clear the level!
tutorial.tutorial3:
Level: Tutorial 3
In this level, something new appears‚ÄîStrawberry Jam! You'll find out what happens when you touch it ))))
Switch dimensions wisely to clear the level!

level_reminder.level1:
Level: 1
It seems you should have mastered the gameplay by now. The rest is up to you to explore!
If you think this map is good, remember to like and favorite it~
level_reminder.level2:
Level: 2
This level... seems... you can't jump?!
level_reminder.level7:
Level: 7
That's right!!! This level is another special one.
In this level, your movement speed is crazy fast!
What's that? You said you can sneak? Sorry, but your sneaking speed is ZERO.
And of course, to prevent you from taking a leap of faith, jumping is also disabled~
Thanks to @Âù¶ÁéáÁöÑË°ÄÁøºËù†5801 (12823830) for reporting the exploit spot!
level_reminder.level8:
Level: 8
Someone pulled off a tricky move here! In this level, when you're in the "Black" dimension, everything is normal. But when you're in the "White" dimension, the direction keys are reversed!
level_reminder.level10:
Level: 10
Credits: Creative Contribution - ‰πòÈ£éÁöÑÂ∞èÊôö (50477944)
Combining elements from previous levels 2 & 3: Speed Boost + White Dimension Reversal + No Jumping + No Sneaking
level_reminder.level15:
Level: 15
Something new has appeared: Launch Pads!
The blue launch pad gives you a high jump; the purple one makes you jump even higher!

dialogs.joinwelcome:
{{name}}, welcome to the Black & White!
The parkour is divided into two dimensions: Black and White.
The Black Dimension features a black-themed scene, while the White Dimension features a white-themed scene. Press the E key or left (A) key to switch between Black ‚Üí White or White ‚Üí Black.
The terrain in the Black and White Dimensions is different. After switching dimensions by pressing E or left (A), your relative position to the origin points of both dimensions remains unchanged.
You'll need to flexibly switch between the Black and White Dimensions to complete the parkour.
Credits:
1. Â∞ß (383025200313334)
2. ‰∏•ËÇÉÁöÑÂäõÂ£´Áî≤Ëô´-fC7 (13151057)

dialogs.bug_report: Please report issues in the comments section, or email the author at oyroyroyr@163.com. If adopted, you will receive map green particle effects as a gift.

Are you sure you want to delete your data?
All data will disappear after deletion!

All data will be automatically saved every time you step on a save point

skin.title: Select Skin
skin.content: Please select the skin to use

shop.title: What do you want to buy?
shop.content:
What do you want to buy?
You have {{exp}} exp
Description: Name (Price) (Remarks)
shop.green_particle: Permanent Green Particle Effect (150exp) (Sync across all maps)
shop.creeper_skin: Permanent Creeper Skin (500exp) (Sync across all maps) (Who knows what the author made the skin look like)
shop.steve_skin: Permanent Steve Skin (500exp) (Sync across all maps) (The restoration is pretty good, right?)
shop.fly_privilege: One-time Flight Privilege (70exp) (Enable flight, can only be used in one map! Valid for: 2s)
shop.fly_speed: One-time Flight Speed Changer (5exp) (Change flight speed, can only be used in one map! Prerequisite: Flight already enabled)
shop.shrink_potion: Shrink Potion (70exp) (One-time, reduces character size by 50%, cannot stack)
shop.enlarge_potion: Enlarge Potion (70exp) (One-time, increases character size by 50%, cannot stack)
shop.not_enough_exp_or_owned: Not enough exp or already own the skin

backpack.title: What do you want to use?
backpack.content:
